SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: This example shows an agent with a default commission rate of 3%

PARAMETERS.NAME: contactID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: The contact ID of the marketing agent

PARAMETERS.NAME: taxRuleID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: PUT Only: The tax rule to be specified for this agent. 1 = Excluding GST, 2 = Including GST, 3 = Exempt

PARAMETERS.NAME: commissionRate
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: PUT ONLY: The percentage commission, between 0 and 100, that the agent will receive.

PARAMETERS.NAME: Custom_Field_[variableName]
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: PUT ONLY: Custom fields may be updated by specifying their variable name prefixed by custom_field_ EG: custom_field_region, custom_field_specialty. Values used should correspond to the custom field specified. Note: this will not create custom fields, they must already exist.

DESCRIPTION: This endpoint is only available for clients using the Marketing/Sales Agents feature. It returns a structure representing the data set against a marketing/sales agent. This includes custom fields, if applicable. If the user has finance view permissions, this will also return the agent's default commission rate as a percentage. Without this permission, this key will not be returned. This endpoint only supports searching by contactID. If the contactID passed is not a marketing agent, a 204 No Content will be returned. A 412 will be returned when using PUT if any required parameters are missing or exceed allowed values. A 404 will be returned on put if the record does not exist. NOTE: PUT requests cannot reassign an agentID to a different contact, contactID or Agent ID will be used to locate the record, with contactID taking preference.
